Favorite Books

Books that have shaped my thinking and technical expertise

Introduction to Flight

John D. Anderson Jr.

Comprehensive guide to aerodynamics and flight mechanics. Essential reading for aerospace engineers.

Read Review
Clean Code

Robert C. Martin

A handbook of agile software craftsmanship. Transformed how I approach software development.

Read Review
Astrophysics for People in a Hurry

Neil deGrasse Tyson

Fascinating insights into the universe and space exploration. Inspiring for any aerospace enthusiast.

Read Review
Numerical Methods for Engineers

Steven C. Chapra

Comprehensive coverage of numerical techniques essential for engineering computations.

Read Review
The Fourth Industrial Revolution

Klaus Schwab

Explores the impact of emerging technologies on society and industry transformation.

Read Review
Making Embedded Systems

Elecia White

Practical guide to embedded systems design and development. Perfect for my current focus area.

Read Review
